name: Curse of the Crow
description:
Do not summon what you cannot put down again.

Curse of the Crow is a  fast-paced platformer made for the fourth BenBonk Game Jam. Run from your inadvertently-summoned crow demon before it gets you to do who-knows what!

Controls

  • Arrows/WASD - Movement. Keys on the same spots as WASD should work, for foreign keyboards.
  • Space/Z/L - Jump, keys on the same spots as Z/L on foreign keyboards work, similar to WASD.
  • P - Pause. It's not ESC, that's fullscreen.
  • Mouse - Aim held item, look left/right slightly.
  • Left Click - Pick up nearby item/throw held item

Retrospective

I'm extremely proud of this game! ZzTBat's music and the pace of the game worked wonderfully, and I knocked it out of the park with polish. Unfortunately that comes at a cost of literally only three levels, one of which being a tutorial, but oh well, c'est, la vie.

It's definitely going on the games-to-extend shortlist, though!

I also think I did a good job with the music ;) - Zz
